attributes.action: force banks to display their credit rating
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent events have shown us that a saving account is like any other investment with a risk vs return ratio. However many people do not consider the risk and only look at the return (Interest rates etc). Therefore I would suggest that banks should be forced to prominently display their credit rating alongside any relevant information (Such as interest rates on current accounts). This should help everyone make an informed decision.
